notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.E.W. conceived of the study, and along with E.P.O., K.C.R., and S.G.S. provided lake optical data and analysis. S.M. and J.L.T. carried out the SIP modeling. A.L. and R.M.L. provided expertise and text on human pathogens, R.G.Z. provided the data for the Manitowoc case study, and all authors contributed to the writing.
